00019 /********************************************************************************
00020                                                         UTF-8 Bit Distribution
00021 
00022 UTF-16                                                                  1st Byte 2nd Byte 3rd Byte 4th Byte
00023 -------- -------- -------- --------     -------- -------- -------- --------
00024 00000000 0xxxxxxx                                               0xxxxxxx
00025 00000yyy yyxxxxxx                                               110yyyyy 10xxxxxx
00026 zzzzyyyy yyxxxxxx                                               1110zzzz 10yyyyyy 10xxxxxx
00027 110110ww wwzzzzyy 110111yy yyxxxxxx         11110uuu 10uuzzzz 10yyyyyy 10xxxxxx
00028 
00029 NOTE:
00030  uuuuu = wwww+1 (to account for addition of 0x10000 as in Section 3.7, Surrogates)
00031 
00032 **********************************************************************************/
00033 
00034
